data.text: En ngʼa moseyie wach ma walando,
Nodongo e nyime mana ka chuny yath mayom matwi;
To kare ne ochwowe mana nikech kethowa,
Wan duto, waselal mana ka rombe,
Nosande kichwade malit to ne ok otingʼo dhoge;
Ne oyale angʼaya kendo nongʼadne bura molal kode.
Ne okete e bur e kind joricho
To kata kamano ne en dwaro Jehova Nyasaye
Bangʼ chandruokne duto enone ler mar ngima
Kuom mano abiro miye pok e kind thuondi
